Envato Elements: Photos Invitation | Private & Confidential View in browser
New Earning Opportunity for Photographers
Invitation only
Hi {!Lead.Company},
{!User.FirstName} here from Envato, hope you're doing well!
We loved your portfolio on {!Lead.LeadSource__c} and think you could be a great fit for a new creative community we're building called Envato Elements.
Envato Elements offers a carefully curated selection of high quality digital assets to agencies, designers, corporate marketers and other professionals. One year in, we have 1,200 talented authors, more than 340,000 quality items and a rapidly growing subscriber base.
We added a photos category to Envato Elements a few months ago and our photographers are already seeing fantastic results:
----------------------------------------
"My income on Elements became the second most important in July. Did not expect. It is very nice." - Photo author
"Envato is now one of my top sites, so congratulations and thank you!" - Photo author
"June's earnings on Envato Elements was almost as much as I got from Adobe Stock, which is my #2 earning site. Was pleasantly surprised. Wish Envato Elements all the best." - Photo Author
----------------------------------------
You can read about our innovative subscriber share model here.
What Are We Looking For?
Self-curated collections in line with our Commercial demand guidelines A commitment to uploading photos every month. (Ideally 100 photos every month however, we can discuss what is achievable for you.)
If you're interested in joining our community and being part of the Elements journey, simply reply "I'm interested" and we'll get back to you with next steps.
Feel free to ask any questions you may have about this invitation only offer. Thank you so much and hope to hear from you soon! :-)
Regards, {!User.FirstName} Envato Elements
